introduction: SYNOPSISMi-young who got kidnapped by her boyfriend's friend is forced to act in a porn film and then is sold to become prostitute for foreign men. Joon-ho, her boyfriend, comes looking for her but she is already given up hope. One day, Mi-young is moved to a reformation center by officials where they treat her worse than they do in prison that even her parents could not get her out. After a few attempted escape and suicides, she is subjected to violence in the center but her parents manage to get her out. Since she got out of the reformation center, she starts working at a coffee shop where she meets the rich man, Oh. He offers to spend rest of his life with her. She accepts his offer on a condition that he helps her parents financially and finds happiness in the love transcending the age difference.
